name: MonsterBag
description:
Forgetful Nia leaves behind her monster backpack, V, on her way to the bus stop. In a world afraid of monsters, help V catch up to Nia while avoiding been seen by the humans. Oh, yeah! Watch out for the apocalypse.

• Embark on an odyssey to reunite a monster bag and his owner Nia, while accidentally starting an apocalypse along the way
• Avoid humans by remaining hidden. You’ll need your best puzzle solving skills, distractions and timing to avoid certain death.
• Journey through 18 levels and face off against challenging bosses in a battle of wits and skill.

1 player(s)
100KB Minimum

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
